text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence Are you going to hold yourselves accountable for what you did and failed to do during the Coronavirus pandemic?  Because your inaction cost many thousands of American citizens their lives.  We are not confused about this and won’t forget. @realDonaldTrump @PressSec
